message.content:
cs.CV, cs.RO, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.MM 

This paper focuses on the task of recovering 3D human poses from monocular images, which is a computer vision problem. Therefore, cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) is the most likely sub-category. Additionally, the paper proposes a self-supervised learning mechanism for accurate 3D human pose estimation, which involves two dual learning tasks and integrates 2D spatial relationship, temporal smoothness of predictions, and 3D geometric knowledge. This suggests that the paper may also belong to sub-categories such as cs.RO (Robotics), cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), and cs.MM (Multimedia).
